com.noctarius.borabora

Interface Parser


  • public interface Parser

    The Parser class is the entry point for all parsing related activities. This includes element query, as well as any kind of CBOR encoded stream extraction. The parser is implemented as a so-called skip-scan parser, reading the type and length of an element and skipping right over when it is not needed and further necessary. Returned Value instances are fully lazily read whenever the actual represented value is requested.

    Parser implementation is thread-safe and stateless, therefore a single parser instance can be shared and used concurrently by multiple threads.

    A common example how to query an element from the CBOR stream is shown in the following snippet:

         Parser parser = Parser.newParser();
     Input input = Input.fromByteArray( getByteArray() );
     Query query = parser.newQueryBuilder().stream( 0 ).sequence( 10 ).build();
     Value value = parser.read( input, query );
    See Also:
    Input, Query

      Searches and extracts a Value from the given Input instance, representing the the CBOR encoded input stream, and tries to search and match a single element against the given query string, which will be first prepared / transformed into a Query instance and afterwards used to match the elements.

    • Method Detail

      • read

        Value read(Input input,
           Query query)

        Searches and reads a Value from the given Input instance, representing the the CBOR encoded input stream, and tries to search and match a single element against the given Query instance.

        If a matching value is found it will be returned, otherwise Value.NULL_VALUE is returned to represent a non-existing value.

        The method is completely thread-safe and the same parser instance can be used concurrently from multiple threads.

        Parameters:
        input - the input stream instance to parse
        query - the query instance to execute against the input stream
        Returns:
        the first, or only matched value
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - is thrown whenever an illegal state has occurred while parsing
        WrongTypeException - is thrown whenever an unexpected type was found while parsing

      • read

        Value read(Input input,
           String query)

        Searches and reads a Value from the given Input instance, representing the the CBOR encoded input stream, and tries to search and match a single element against the given query string, which will be first prepared / transformed into a Query instance and afterwards used to match the elements.

        It is generally recommended to either use the Query-API to generate the queries or to use prepareQuery(String) once and store the Query instance for reuse.

        If a matching value is found it will be returned, otherwise Value.NULL_VALUE is returned to represent a non-existing value.

        The method is completely thread-safe and the same parser instance can be used concurrently from multiple threads.

        Parameters:
        input - the input stream instance to parse
        query - the query string to transform and execute against the input stream
        Returns:
        the first, or only matched value
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - is thrown whenever an illegal state has occurred while parsing
        WrongTypeException - is thrown whenever an unexpected type was found while parsing
        QueryParserException - is thrown whenever an error occurred while parsing the actual query string into a Query instance

      • read

        Value read(Input input,
           long offset)

        Reads a Value from the given Input instance, representing the the CBOR encoded input stream and returns the Value instance at the given offset. The offset is only lightly validated by trying to read MajorType and ValueType but does not analyze it any further. That means it is possible to see further errors when try to access the actual content of the returned value instance.

        The method is completely thread-safe and the same parser instance can be used concurrently from multiple threads.

        Parameters:
        input - the input stream instance to parse
        offset - the offset of the request element inside the CBOR stream
        Returns:
        the first, or only matched value

      • read

        void read(Input input,
          Query query,
          Consumer<Value> consumer)

        Searches and reads Values from the given Input instance, representing the the CBOR encoded input stream, and tries to search and match elements against the given Query instance.

        If a matching value is found the Value instance is passed to the consumer for further usage by the customer application.

        The method is completely thread-safe and the same parser instance can be used concurrently from multiple threads.

        Parameters:
        input - the input stream instance to parse
        query - the query instance to execute against the input stream
        consumer - the consumer to receive all matching values
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - is thrown whenever an illegal state has occurred while parsing
        WrongTypeException - is thrown whenever an unexpected type was found while parsing

      • read

        void read(Input input,
          String query,
          Consumer<Value> consumer)

        Searches and reads Values from the given Input instance, representing the the CBOR encoded input stream, and tries to search and match elements against the given query string, which will be first prepared / transformed into a Query instance and afterwards used to match the elements.

        It is generally recommended to either use the Query-API to generate the queries or to use prepareQuery(String) once and store the Query instance for reuse.

        If a matching value is found the Value instance is passed to the consumer for further usage by the customer application.

        The method is completely thread-safe and the same parser instance can be used concurrently from multiple threads.

        Parameters:
        input - the input stream instance to parse
        query - the query string to transform and execute against the input stream
        consumer - the consumer to receive all matching values
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - is thrown whenever an illegal state has occurred while parsing
        WrongTypeException - is thrown whenever an unexpected type was found while parsing
        QueryParserException - is thrown whenever an error occurred while parsing the actual query string into a Query instance

      • extract

        byte[] extract(Input input,
               Query query)

        Searches and extracts a Value from the given Input instance, representing the the CBOR encoded input stream, and tries to search and match a single element against the given Query instance.

        If a matching value is found it will be returned as a CBOR encoded byte-array, otherwise an empty (zero-length) byte-array.

        The method is completely thread-safe and the same parser instance can be used concurrently from multiple threads.

        Parameters:
        input - the input stream instance to parse
        query - the query instance to execute against the input stream
        Returns:
        the extracted byte-array containing the CBOR encoded object
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - is thrown whenever an illegal state has occurred while parsing
        WrongTypeException - is thrown whenever an unexpected type was found while parsing

      • extract

        byte[] extract(Input input,
               String query)

        Searches and extracts a Value from the given Input instance, representing the the CBOR encoded input stream, and tries to search and match a single element against the given query string, which will be first prepared / transformed into a Query instance and afterwards used to match the elements.

        It is generally recommended to either use the Query-API to generate the queries or to use prepareQuery(String) once and store the Query instance for reuse.

        If a matching value is found it will be returned as a CBOR encoded byte-array, otherwise an empty (zero-length) byte-array.

        The method is completely thread-safe and the same parser instance can be used concurrently from multiple threads.

        Parameters:
        input - the input stream instance to parse
        query - the query string to transform and execute against the input stream
        Returns:
        the extracted byte-array containing the CBOR encoded object
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - is thrown whenever an illegal state has occurred while parsing
        WrongTypeException - is thrown whenever an unexpected type was found while parsing
        QueryParserException - is thrown whenever an error occurred while parsing the actual query string into a Query instance

      • extract

        byte[] extract(Input input,
               long offset)

        Extracts a Value from the given Input instance, representing the the CBOR encoded input stream and returns the Value instance at the given offset. The offset is only lightly validated by trying to read MajorType and ValueType but does not analyze it any further. That means it is possible to see further errors when try to access the actual content of the returned value instance.

        The method is completely thread-safe and the same parser instance can be used concurrently from multiple threads.

        Parameters:
        input - the input stream instance to parse
        offset - the offset of the request element inside the CBOR stream
        Returns:
        the extracted byte-array containing the CBOR encoded object

      • prepareQuery

        Query prepareQuery(String query)
        Parses and prepares a given query string into a Query instance. The returned query instance is fully thread-safe and stateless and can be stored and shared by multiple threads.
        Parameters:
        query - the query string to transform
        Returns:
        the parsed, transformed and prepared query to store for further execution
        Throws:
        WrongTypeException - is thrown whenever an unexpected type was found while preparing
        QueryParserException - is thrown whenever an error occurred while parsing the actual query string into a Query instance

      • newQueryBuilder

        StreamQueryBuilder newQueryBuilder()
        Returns a new QueryBuilder instance to configure a Query instance. The eventually build query instance is fully thread-safe and stateless and can be stored and shared by multiple threads.
        Returns:
        the new QueryBuilder instance

      • newBuilder

        static ParserBuilder newBuilder()
        Creates a new ParserBuilder instance to fluently configure and create a Parser instance.
        Returns:
        a new builder to configure and create a Parser instance

      • newParser

        static Parser newParser()
        Creates a new Parser instance with the default configuration. This method is a shorthand for 
        Parser.newBuilder().build()
        and the result is equivalent.
        Returns:
        a new Parser instance with default configuration
